title: G-5 - One Piece Wiki
author: One Piece Wiki Contributors
notes: Information about the G-5 Marine branch, its structure, members, and role in the Punk Hazard arc. Provided details about the unit structure and named marines like Bomba, Bakezo, Pike, Jero, and Gal.

title: Tashigi - One Piece Wiki
author: One Piece Wiki Contributors
notes: Character page for Tashigi providing background on her role as Captain of G-5 Unit 01 and her relationship with the G-5 Marines.

author: One Piece Wiki Contributors
notes: Arc overview providing context for Episode 605's place within the larger Punk Hazard storyline.
